attributes.title: Come What Mayor - Ep. 53
attributes.caption: Returning from their harrowing battle under Shearlake, the interns are on the road back to Boulderay, now with a captured Paralyte in tow. With the knowledge of Entropa, Sorto, and the Diagems weighing heavily on them, maybe a little shopping with a traveling salesman is just what they need...
attributes.description:

attributes.title: Into the Melding Pot - Ep. 54
attributes.caption: Ambushed by an assassin sent to kill Kyborg, the Interns reunite with an old friend that helps them track down a source of knowledge in the imposing Temple of Dia.

attributes.title: Deja-Kydelius - Ep. 55
attributes.caption: Hungover from the previous night’s festivities, the newly-promoted Infinights learn of a new way to re-live Kyborg’s memories in a search for clues to the location of Quadron. But can they weather the trauma of a painful past?
attributes.description:

attributes.title: Magic Box Down - Ep. 56
attributes.caption: Returning from Kyborg’s Memory, the Infinights find more than a few surprises prepared for them at HQ. But now that they can conquer the skies, is it time to set off on a new adventure?

attributes.title: May the Source Be With You - Ep. 57
attributes.caption: The new Infinights enter the mystifying Source Monolith and come face to face with puzzling paradoxes that challenge them to their very core.

attributes.title: You Shall Not Pyous Pass - Ep. 58
attributes.caption: The party returns to Pyous Pass to learn what’s transpired since their departure, and finds that aiding a beleaguered town from an untraceable menace may be the key to reaching their final destination.

attributes.title: Load Off One’s Chest - Ep. 59
attributes.caption: Now with captives to question in the Pyous Pass Jailhouse, the party splits up and resorts to unusual tactics to extract information. Can they get the information they seek, or will they make a terrible mistake?

attributes.title: Cards On The Tabul - Ep. 60
attributes.caption: The Infinights witness a transformative experience and forge a new alliance helping them navigate the Flats of Tabul. But will that be enough to survive the dangers waiting in this desert dominion?

attributes.title: No Arm, No Foul - Ep. 61
attributes.caption: The party enters the Tabulian lair as they hurry to save the Pye prisoners from a terrible fate, but every step brings them closer to danger, and the fearsome M’ra.

attributes.title: Quadron Vs. Kyborg - Ep. 62
attributes.caption: Infiltrating Quadron’s ceremony in an attempt to save the Pyes, the Infinights realize they may have more allies in their fight than they thought, causing pandemonium that comes to a crashing conclusion.

attributes.title: Flats Lady Sings - Ep. 63
attributes.caption: The Interns start their harrowing escape from the Tabulian Lair with the help of an old friend. Will they make it out with all their limbs intact? Find out in the thrilling conclusion to the Armageddon arc!

attributes.title: Stinky Dragon Side Quest: Honey Heist 2022
attributes.caption: Join Gus, Jon, Barbara, Blaine, and game master Chris for the bear heist of a lifetime in Honey Heist! The players know two things- they have a complex plan that requires precise timing to pull off and they are GOSH. DANG. BEARS.
